00027 // Note To Mods //
00028 /*
00029 Please do not change anything here and release it..
00030 There is going to be a new forum created just for the Kademlia side of the client..
00031 If you feel there is an error or a way to improve something, please
00032 post it in the forum first and let us look at it.. If it is a real improvement,
00033 it will be added to the offical client.. Changing something without knowing
00034 what all it does can cause great harm to the network if released in mass form..
00035 Any mod that changes anything within the Kademlia side will not be allowed to advertise
00036 there client on the eMule forum..
00037 */

00079 struct SSearchTerm
00080 {
00081     SSearchTerm();
00082     ~SSearchTerm();
00083     
00084     enum ESearchTermType {
00085         AND,
00086         OR,
00087         NOT,
00088         String,
00089         MetaTag,
00090         OpGreaterEqual,
00091         OpLessEqual,
00092         OpGreater,
00093         OpLess,
00094         OpEqual,
00095         OpNotEqual
00096     } type;
00097     
00098     CTag* tag;
00099     wxArrayString* astr;
00100 
00101     SSearchTerm* left;
00102     SSearchTerm* right;
00103 };

00124     bool AddNotes(const CUInt128& keyID, const CUInt128& sourceID, Kademlia::CEntry* entry, uint8_t& load);
00125     bool AddLoad(const CUInt128& keyID, uint32_t time);
00126     size_t GetFileKeyCount() const throw() { return m_Keyword_map.size(); }
00127     void SendValidKeywordResult(const CUInt128& keyID, const SSearchTerm* pSearchTerms, uint32_t ip, uint16_t port, bool oldClient, uint16_t startPosition, const CKadUDPKey& senderKey);

00131     uint32_t m_totalIndexSource;
